content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on my porch on a clear day. when from the north i saw a blimp coming. i see the all the time going to the stadium. but this blimp was the new minion blimp. a character in a children's movie. so i figured i would take a couple photos with my ipad. there was nothing in the sky but this blimp. i took one photo and two seconds katerina i took the next. when i looked at the blimp after taking photos. it still was the only thing in the sky. but when i looked at the photos there was an object in only one of them. a disc object with wings flying behind the blimp in a distance.  it appeared to be dark gray from the picture. one wing came out of the craft a bit and turned straight up. the same with the other side. it seemed to be on an angle like as if it was making a turn. i never saw this object with the naked eye. i still have the photo if you are interested?      for some reason i cannot attach the photos. if you have an email i would really love for you to see them.
content.summary: When taking photo of blimp. disc shaped object appeared in one of my photos.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a work assignment in germany, photography being my hobby i was taking pictures of cloud formations with my dslr it was a very bright sunny day. i initially took pictures of various cloud formations later while developing them i light room when i adjusted the exposure and contrast i was astonished to see what i could capture. 

1.If you see what i have circled in the first pic you will see 3 rod like mini ufos who are travelling in a straight direction. 

2.Later i saw a nice cloud formation from my window and was excited to take a picture in that picture i have captured 3 different ufos these look like saucers but since they are far off at an angle you can only make out cross section. if you zoom the picture you can clearly differentiate between flying birds in vicinity 2 small ufos and 1 larger ufo of a mother ship kind.



3.Also on other day i was taking pictures of nice full moon during which i saw a dark object moving at tremendous speeds away from earth when i clicked the object was a centimeter below the lower outline of moon bz the time it was captured you can see how far it has moved. during this same time i had captured a weird looking thing travelling in the similar direction.


all the photos i have uploaded have been worked upon in light room for contrast, sharpness and exposure correction. if required i can also help with the unedited pictures.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of cloud formations on a bright sunny day when i was devloping them was astonished to see what i captured

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon,

the report i���m about to present is of utter importance and attention.
first of all i was not a believer in ufos and stuff since i only believe what i see until this ufo sighting. i was so very distressed after this sighting that i planned to report it to isro, india. but then i contacted a friend of mine and he suggested that it'll be of no use. he told me that i should watch hangar 1 that was being telecasted on history tv 18 at that time. mufon case files changed my vision a lot and i pledged to report it to any concerned authority other than dying with this secret.

but before reporting the incident i would like to describe my place of residence i.E. babina. it is actually the biggest army base in india. i being the son of a retired army personnel, know the military might of this area but i cannot disclose anything further. just to give you an insight of what is it, i would tell you that every year the singapore 
army visits only this place in india for military training. even the u.S. marines came here in 2010 for training.

the incident:-
those days the temperature was scorching like 48-49 degree celsius in our state with frequent electricity cutoffs for hours. it was on 18th june when we decided to spend some time on the roof stargazing and to experience some cool breeze that used to blow at night. so at about 10:15 pm we went there and lay down stargazing and chatting.
at nearly 10:36 pm something caught my attention that flew past my peripheral vision and immediately i glanced at it, watching me act so rapidly my younger brother too saw at the same direction. both of us witnessed some ghostly balls flying very slowly and noiselessly. it lasted for about 10secs until i lost it amidst the far sky. it was a cloudy night, no stars and winds were blowing pretty fast so we couldn���t really figure out what those things were. really we couldn���t come to any conclusion, it could be anything. 
keeping this in mind we planned to go once again, this time with equipment like binoculars, pen and paper. but the next day due to some important work none of us could go there for a single minute. 

the very next day i.E. 20th june 2014 we reached on our roof, picked the same spot, lied down. but this time we were in deep confusion about whether we could be able see it this time. reason was that night the conditions were completely antagonistic to the previous night of sighting. no wind, no clouds, visible stars, all the locality was lit up since there was no electricity cutoff, loud music coming from nearby marriage house etc.
 
at the same time like the previous night i.E. 10:40 pm we (me, my younger brother, my mother) witnessed 5 (this time clearly visible) orbs, dim yellow in color, randomly glowing, in a fixed formation, from south east, flying at a constant speed of about 20kmph, at above 20-25ft above head, noiselessly and went towards north west (towards the military base). 

in its course of flight, the time when it came just above our head, all three of us were just speechless. i remember the shiver that went through my body. i couldn���t��� even pick up the pen and write the details at the same time. we didn���t even required the binoculars as it was so clearly seen. yeah i was an ufo because i���ve never seen such a thing in my life. i was born and brought up in a military background so i can trust my senses and yes i���m damn sure it was an ufo.
we were so terribly in shock that we didn���t even move. we lost its sight when it went too far and diminished. in all it was visible for 15-20secs but it seemed that we saw it for an hour. 

after that time i ran down and wrote the whole incident on paper and also made a sketch so that i do not forget what i saw. amazing sighting.

thank you.
content.summary: 5 randomly glowing spherical lights

content.detailedDescription: I was playing in my roof with my brother suddenly i saw a bright light in the sky however it was evening but there were no stars in the sky i thought it was a star so i told my brother to see it suddenly it starts moving slowly and then fastly and dissappeared.
content.summary: A light appeared till 10 second and dissappears with a flash and high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I set my camera up to take continuous photos, so that i could make a time-lapse video of the night sky.  when i watched the time-lapse video, i noticed something appear out of nowhere, and get brighter.  the .23s video covers about an hour of photos.  and the object was still there when i finished taking photos.

my camera was set to b&w, so i don't know the color of the object.  

i've made several time-lapse movies of the night sky, but this is the only one with an object appearing.
content.summary: Something slowly appears in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: This blinking orb was moving erratically and the blinks were also random and erratic. first it was clearly visible on the outside of the cloud then it would enter the cloud, weaving in and out for about 3 minutes when it suddenly darted straight into the cloud and disappeared. there were no other signs of air traffic in this area at the time.
content.summary: Saw object weaving through the clouds over kansas city missouri.

content.detailedDescription:
the following account is submitted by investigator david kreiter as informed by an email from a friend and co-worker of the sole witness:
  according to the friend and co-worker of the witness, the primary witness,who is a police officer in muscatine, iowa was on patrol when he noticed a white light that appeared to be moving across the sky. he pulled over into a public facility parking lot to observe the object that was also being recorded on his dash-cam video recorder.  the object was in the southeastern sky.  video of the event might be provided to this investigator.
content.summary: A white light moving steadily across the sky

content.detailedDescription: As i love living on the lake i stepped out on my porch to listen to the animal sounds and saw a bright light over the far end of the lake when i noticed what at first seemed to be a bright light sitting over the far end of our lake. i stepped out into the yard for a better look and noticed than it just looked different than a star in some way. as i watched closely i noticed it moving slowly to the left and then to the right. at times i could see the surrounding sky light up in a reddish / pinkish glow but only for a brief moment each time. i went in the house and took pics with my cell phone but only got somewhat jerky shots of a white dot. at this time i called my wife out to view it with me.......She agreed......It was moving...........Slowly but moving....Sometimes descending and sometimes ascending. i then went into my house to get a better camera on a tripod. i got a couple of shots and as the camera has crosshairs of sorts you could position the object in the center of the lens and could watch in the lens as it moved from the center and up the the upper right section of the lens. i tried to get a short video but could not even find it in the lens in this mode........Only in photo mode did it appear. i noted that we had watched it approximately 45 minutes and it was rather chilly out ( upper 40's to low 50s. also the sky was clear although there was some low hanging fog over the lake that in no way interfered with our viewing. i  felt very fortunate to have seen whatever it was. i have no idea what this could have been and would like to read another report that coincided with my report to see what they saw that night / early morning. was not afraid, overly excited or the like..............Just very curious.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow moving light source that hovered, desceded was stationary as well as ascending and sitting stationary in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our couch in n.E portland, recounting our day to each other.  we keep our windows open on summer evenings.  i was sitting with my back to the west, facing my wife in the east, and to my right is the southern window.  i have a tendency to be observant of noises and movements... call it skiddishness or whatnot, but out of the peripheral to my right i saw a light to the south.  it was 35 to 45 degrees above the horizon, and traveling east.  we live near the airport, so air traffic is common.  my father is a pilot, and i have been around aircraft my entire life, so,  when i noticed that this light was very bright, and did not blink, i turned to my right to view it more observant ly.  at that time, i saw that the object, which was football-blimp shaped, was extremely bright, like an arc light from welding, emitting greens, blues and pinks at the corona of the light.  this piqued my interest, and i asked my wife to look at it.  she had noticed my reaction and was already leaning in to look at what i was reacting to.  for a moment, i thought it might be a firework, as we have seen/heard them every weekend since the fouth, but this object zig-zagged in a downward motion ain't then dropped suddenly.  my wife saw it as well, and we both went to the back yard to continue looking, our previous conversation forgotten.  there was a sound that accompanied the object, actually, it precluded it... like high-frequency, glass upon glass.  i heard it again after the sighting ended, but now the sound is gone.  the entire sighting lasted approximately two minutes.  this is the fifth sighting i have had in my lifetime, but by far the clearest.  i am certain that this was not a known craft to my knowledge, nor was it a firework.  the movement was smooth and intentional.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Zigzagging craft, descending.

content.detailedDescription: On my friends farm, when i saw this weird bright light that was very eratic. it had a beam come down to the ground for about 10 sec.
content.summary: Eratic and silent

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sir,

i am not the the eye witness of this case u have but i have read this news in some news papers and channel news channels.I just want to let you know the ufo are flying over india,
content.summary: Is tha a ufo flying over india?

content.detailedDescription:
Arriving home at 12:59 am,  i startled what i thought was a deer at the bottom of my property. i thought it was a deer because that is what i usually see in the middle of the night. the thing that made me think it was a deer i was looking at were the two dark eyes. to my surprise, the "deer" stood up on two legs instead of scampering off into the brush. it stood up and stared back at me for  long 5 seconds or so. it then turned and ran into an invisible doorway and disappeared. it was tall. approximately 7 feet tall.   beige in color . two tones of blonde and dirty blonde. the head was huge. squarish on the top.  skinny. had a body like the geiko lizard.  skinny arms. no tapering from shoulders to waist. 
   if that wasn't strange enough, after reentering the car after getting out to unlock the gate to my driveway, all of the windows in the car were wide open. there was also a perfect hole punctured through the shirt i was wearing.
content.summary: I looked an alien in the eyes..

content.detailedDescription:
Early in the morning, i sat outside with my dog enjoying a cup of coffee. i noticed my dog staring into the sky. i found it to be unusual behavior. normally when he sees birds in the sky,  his eyes follow the birds. this particular time his eyes were fixed. i took a picture of him staring and caught two objects on camera. these objects were not visible to my eyes. i feel my dog did see them by the look on his face in the photo. 
  this was the start of many sightings in these past months. since this day i have taken multiple pictures as well as video of other craft.
content.summary: My dog was staring up when i took a digital photo and the object which was invisible to the naked eye showed up on camera

content.detailedDescription: We were in the the craft and it was oval in shape . they let us all out along a body of water and 2 of of us tried to get the rest to go with us but they seemed to be in a coma and when we ran we ran into a force or something  and when we turned around the saucer was changing from that into a triangle and every part fit perfectly together and just before they took us all back on board they let go a left quad away and left a white cloud of vapor which choked us all and that is the last i remember.If you hear from someone else i,ll be here to help them.
content.summary: Taken with 6 or 7 others

content.detailedDescription:
My name is "d" i am 11 years old about to turn 12 i saw a blue orbed white glowing light much like a star but bigger much bigger. my father was involved in this activity unexpectedly. my father is 52 name is "m". these blue glowing object was slowly but surely flying a started getting faster and faster and started heading down east and probably towards the ground we cannot see where because our trees in our neighborhood blocked our site and that is my story.
my name is "m" i am "d's" father. the object observed was more than four times larger than any other celestial object in view other than the moon. the light appeared very bright luminescent stationary at first and then the object moved. the movement was in a straight line pattern until dropping below observable line of sight. our family hobbies are astronomy we are familiar with objects in the sky. this was very unique source of light unknown. the movement appeared to be very controlled. the object started a slow movement towards the south then descended with acceleration. again unknown source just reporting and in different object in the sky.

thank you
[names removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Blue circular object at distance, but trajected at direct course to below line of site.

content.detailedDescription:
I was asked by michael milton to fill out this form. i filled out the  mufon questionnaire and scored a 24 out of 30. kathleen marden  contacted me and she put me in touch with michele. after speaking to him about what seems to be a lifetime of possible abductions, he asked me to fill this form out.  the only memory i have of seeing a ufo was the night i was on my back deck with my husband. we observed a bright light grow and quickly maneuver in the sky. it mad directional changes that seemed impossible. as it appeared closer, the light grew larger and hovered just off our property line, but still high in the sky. i ran inside the house to lock the doors, feeling of fear came over me. my husband would not come in so i went back out so i wouldn't be alone. we watched the hovering light for a while.I have had strange paranormal occurrences for as long as i can remember. i thought it was normal and that the house was haunted. my mother had very strange thing happen as well. in 2010 after the light in the sky i started to have ���sleep paralysis��� after having it in 2010 i remembered that i use to have thing all the time as a child throughout my teens. i found it very odd that i would forget something like that. in 2013 i had another ���sleep paralysis��� episode, this time i was fully awake, fought off my attackers and was able to recall more of what happened the next day. i also had bruises and marks on my legs and body.  after the encounter i no longer thought i was dealing with ghost or sleep paralysis. 
i was the only one awake and i was watching shark week late night. i was sitting in my bed and the room light up. i walked to my window, where the light was coming from, and looked out. i couldn't see anything so i got back in bed and as i looked up at the t.V. i could see a dark figure standing at the foot of my bed. i stared at it, and it stared at me. i was trying to figure out what it was. i felt like it was trying to force me to sleep, like i was being sedated and paralyzed. over the years i had developed a strong intuition, and empathic abilities so i attempted to mentally fight back. i refused to sleep! a second shadow appeared and zapped me! my head felt like it was going to explode; i could hear a loud noise that vibrated from my ears and head down my body. it zapped me three times before rendering me unconscious.  i never thought about the possibility of aliens before this night. i always thought i was a demon or ghost that was tormenting me over the years but after that night i started to look into the possibility. this year i have seen these things 5 or 6 times in the last few months monday july 21st being the most recent. i can't remember much just bits but i see the evidence the next day. i have been taking pictures of the ���scoop marks���, scars and bruising on my body. my oldest son has seen them too on the same nights i have but has no marks.
content.summary: Husband and i observed a bright light in the night sky. the light got brighter and larger as it grew closer. the object maneuvered fast going different directions in the sky before, hovering just off our property line. it radiating colors.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an independent contractor, i delivery the newspapers. one mornig while in mid-route i noticed a very bright light in the distance extremely lower tham the stars in the sky. as i got closer it seemed to be a acorn/t shaped. it startled me because i am a believer in the ufo so initially i thought it was my mind playing games. as i kept going on my route no matter what side of the street the house i was throwing to was on this figure kept catching my attention. so i pulled over to pull out my phone and started recording. in the recording i am narrating that fact that the light is hovering and is not moving. also it is extremely lower than the stars which u may have trouble viewing in the ameture video but i state the fact that its brighter and lower than the stars. i continue my route because i have a time frame to deliver all the papers but i cant really stay focused. 10 mins pass and its still there so i pull over again and snap a picture. i also state on the video that you can't see the shape of the item but as i'm physically looking through the sky i can see the shape of the craft but on the video and the picture you can't make out the shape all u see is a very bright light. it's about a quarter to 6 am and by the time the sun was starting to come up������to������make it very visible it was gone. i didn't see when it left because of course i was on my route. also before the sun came up even more the stars were gone but this bright light was still there. (i will attach my picture but to see the video you will have to contact me through my email and we will go further on because i am using profanity and i read you guys don't want profanity.
                                                                     sincerely,
                                                                  bemjamin franklin
content.summary: Vieved a cone like object one morning while on my paper route in california!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I saw three small star-like moving stars in the sky and observed them from my kitchen window from about 5:45 to 6:15 am.  i went outside expecting to see a bright ufo object because i have seen it before.

the unusual thing is that i played a game with the ufo.  i positioned my line of sight so that a tree was near.  i stared at the ufo for about 10 seconds and then i blocked my view ufo with the tree.  the ufo moved into my field of vision.  i played this game with the ufo 9 times and it moved up, left and right.  it is crazy to think that the ufo was observing me but that is my only conclusion.  why would a tiny ball of light pay attention to my field of vision.  i call this game "peek a boo" and i have played it hundreds of times with various light sources that seem to move.

these things have happened in the last 9 months.

at night the stars in my area seem too bright.  i can view them even when my house light is on.  i can see them if i am standing under a street light.  one day i looked out of my kitchen window and i saw a "star" in front of the tall trees.  i rushed outside and i saw the light going upward like it was on a long piece of wire.  another time i was looking at an unusual light and i saw a star light descend.  the movement is very smooth.  

near the beginning, around 9 months ago, i was outside looking at the lights because they seemed unusual and a star light was descending right above me.  it was still in the sky but i could see it was coming down toward me.  i rushed inside, took a few breaths, and then went back outside.  i could see the star light descend, wait a few seconds, and then ascend.  

near the beginning i woke up unusually early, around 5:45am, and i could see three stars moving some out of my kitchen window.  i watched them for about 10 minutes and then i saw a light that was moving.  the light seemed to be going toward another light and when they collided there was an explosion.  it was about the size of the moon.  it was big and very surprising.  i have seen 3 explosives in total.

the next day after seeing the explosions i got up about 5:15 am.  i could see stars moving some and they formed a large triangle.  then i saw another light source, it appeared in the middle of the triangle and it blinked in threes, blink blink blink wait.  i did not see the object but only the blinking light.  i saw it descend in the distance and then i saw it was coming toward me.  i saw it blink in the front of the tall trees.  i was a little shaken up but i went back to bed.  it was very exciting to see.

when i started seeing the odd stars across the road there seemed to be three odd lights in the back of my neighbors garage or building.  light a was always on but it would move some.  light b only came on for 15 seconds and if i was doing something interesting or abnormal.  light c will come on sometimes but it seems to move and flash at me.  lights b and c seem to only come on when i go outside.  

the most interesting light is the light behind my neighbors fence.  if i walk down the fence the light seems to follow me.  if i squat the light seems squat also.  it is about 30 feet away.  it is very bright and appears from 11pm to 2am.  i setup my computer and i ask the light a variety of questions.  i do not get any answers but sometimes the light will blink at me.  i usually play movies for the light.  a couple of weeks ago i played a dvd about people using explosives to blow up old buildings and the light appeared for 3 days in a row which was very unusual.  sometimes the light does not stay for the whole movie.  usually the light appears 2 or 3 days a week.

the light has turned off when i asked the question on my computer, "do you implant metal in humans?".  the next day the light appeared and i asked the same question and the light disappeared.  the third day the light appeared and i asked the same question but the light stayed.  

another time i wrote, "your lights work like a video camera" and the light disappeared.  the interesting part is that months earlier i wrote, "your light work like a camera" and the light did not turn off.  the light has turned off when i made faces at it, this was at the beginning.  the light also turned off when i heard a gun shot.  the light turned off when i held up a newspaper comic zits, apparently aliens don't have a sense of humor.

last week i typed the first two lines of the decoded binary message from the rendlesham forest incident and the light turned off.  i have not seen the light since.  below is what i typed.

exploration of humanity 666 8100
52.0942532n 13.131269w (hy, brasil)

one of the oddest thing is that me and "them" had a counting game.  one night around 2am i was intently looking at a vacant piece of land and wanting to see the aliens do something.  i saw an orange light blink a few times.  i laughed and then blinked back at the other odd lights (a, b, c).  a fist was "off" and an open hand, like the number 5, is "on".  we played this game about 3 times.  one time when i was pulling into the driveway i saw a blinking orange light in my yard, i laughed, and "blinked" back using my hand.  

the blinking game stopped one night.  i saw a blinking orange light and then i saw the backup lights for a car.  it scared me and i hurried inside.  i wrote on the computer that we could play more games but i never saw the blinking orange lights again.  now that i think about it the car was just backing up and not "trying to get me" but at 2am it is hard to think straight after seeing some odd stuff.

and to top everything off i saw an ufo before all of this started.  i turned the main road and it curved some.  there are trees on both sides of the road and at the end of the road because it is a dead end.  the ufo was thin and close to the trees.  the ufo was spanned from the corridor of trees on the left to the ones on the right.  the oddest thing to me was that is had two large flood lights facing me. the flood lights were not next to each other. me and a passenger saw it for about 10 seconds as it slowly drifted to the left. 

the additional pictures are of an ufo that i saw for several months.  i could see it as early as 5:30 pm to 8:30 pm where it appeared to be a very large bright star.  at 5:30 pm it was just a glint but it was in the same location.  i played the "peek a boo" game i mentioned with it everyday.  the pictures where the first day i got a smart phone.  some of the pictures were taken from a moving car.  the day that i took the pictures was the last day i saw the ufo.  it was a little disappointing, the pictures were very crummy, and that ufo never appeared again.  the pictures were taken on december 29 at 6:05 pm and 6:21 pm.
content.summary: The ufo was appeared like a bright star. it was getting to be daylight and the ufo was very easy to see it was ascending up.

content.detailedDescription: On my way to work noticed red like fireball traveling at even pace then split in two separate pieces. one piece continued to travel east other continued to travel west until they came out of my view.
content.summary: One fireball separated into two and went in different directions

content.detailedDescription:
I observed this true event at 11:00 pm on friday night, june 13, 2014, one-half mile from my home in northeast dallas, texas near hexter elementary school. i had walked to gold���s gym at northcliff & buckner at 9:30 pm and had left at 10:50 pm. the sky was clear, with a full moon and no wind, and there was not the usual city traffic noise. 
as i was walking roundabout back to my house, a lighted craft suddenly appeared high over me at northlake near peavy. this occurred within the usual flight path of airplanes originating from south texas and landing at love field; however, i believe that most scheduled southwest airline flights had finished for the night. at first, i thought it was an airplane, but the object actually stopped directly above as i was walking alone in the middle of the street. i instantly felt that it had seen me on the roadway in the full moonlight; otherwise, why would it have positioned itself there ��� coincidence? the craft was about one mile straight up, with the apparent size of a large corporate jet. (i have since studied airplanes flying overhead to confirm this perceived altitude and size.)  
it had extremely bright lights of pure colors, the brightest i have ever seen and the most beautiful red and green. there were no federal aviation administration navigation lights apparent ��� specifically, green on the starboard, red on the port, flashing strobes on the wingtips, with fore and aft white lights as required below 10,000 feet altitude. its lights were arranged in a nonsensical pattern as in the attached diagram, with the red lights pulsing every two seconds ��� this appeared to be the front. the green lights were steady and appeared to be the sides. the body of the craft was not visible as a silhouette against the sky because of the bright lights. it had a clear-cut, garish carnival midway appearance ��� there was no vagueness at all. i immediately realized that this was not an airplane, so i quickly stepped under a front yard tree on northlake to hide from its view. 
	the object circled, did figure-8s, hovered and rocked as i watched from between the leaves. it emitted a very faint but perceptible whirring sound from high up, similar to an electric motor brush. (here, i had both eye and ear confirmation of a materially structured mechanical craft, and of its apparent vertical distance above.) then, i reasoned that if whatever was controlling this thing had infrared vision that i had better get behind the wooden tree limbs, which i promptly did. the object appeared to be methodically searching the ground, so i remained cowing against the tree trunk and became a certified tree-hugger. to add to my problems, the front yard���s motion detector light turned on. 
this weirdness went on for the longest three minutes, and i began to wonder how it would play out. suddenly, without any warning, the object streaked at a downward angle, around 45-degrees, eastward toward the lochwood mall area. it went from directly overhead to behind the horizon tree line, traveling about a one-mile distance, at one constant and terrific speed. (seeing this ���side of the triangle��� reinforced my directly vertical optical and audio estimate as one mile.) there was no observable acceleration against inertia or deceleration against momentum. the entire process was reminiscent of the image of a flashlight beam shined against a wall, whereby the flashlight is steadily swept across and the spotlight moves swiftly in response. there was no sound at all during the dive ��� any whoosh, sonic boom, crash or explosion ��� anything! 
i have used two methods to determine and confirm the exit speed as about mach 1. first, my daughter and i have attended the fort worth alliance air show annually for about twenty years. there are always jet interceptor fly-bys at mach 1, whereby the sound shock wave is visible forming off the fuselage. the june 13 object simply appeared to be diving that fast and that is what i settled on. second, it took about 5 seconds for the craft to go from directly overhead, then down to the tree line, a dive distance of one mile. one mile times five seconds works out to 720 mph, or about mach 1. 
the contrast between the three-minute hovering and the five-second dive was astounding! the circling and wobbling object appeared to be silly, jerky, and almost warner brothers cartoonish with the super bright garish lights ��� the reds pulsing on and off, and the greens glowing steady. if i had witnessed only the hovering phase, i would not be convinced that it was not some type of aircraft. by contrast, had i seen only the five-second dive, i would not be convinced that it was not some reentering satellite debris. this exit plunge was meteor-like and almost blurred. however, both of these phases, when put together said that this was not grandma���s biscuits. 
there is a saying that we should look for ponies before we look for unicorns. in the tradition of looking for ponies, immediately following the sighting i attempted to eliminate any plausible possibilities. i considered a drone as an explanation, and several other folks, including my wife, have since offered the drone scenario. this would fit the hovering and whirring electric motor sound, since several drone models are electric powered hovering devices. however, the size, altitude, lights and exit speed would rule against a drone. drones are relatively small and slow, they fly at low altitudes, and they conserve power in order to stay on station for long periods. all of this goes against the corporate jet-size of the object, which was flying one mile up. drones are secretive and they would not waste electrical power on bright lighting. furthermore, no drone is streamlined or powerful; indeed, this attribute is antithetical to the stealthily purpose of a drone. 
consider the mach 1 exit speed. all drones have propellers or rotors. no propeller driven airplane has ever achieved mach speed and survived ��� ever! this formidable velocity requires an aerodynamic, reinforced coke bottle shaped fuselage, sweptback razor thin wings, and a turbojet engine with a powerful afterburner. even the fabled f-86 saber jet and mig 15 of korean war vintage could not reach the speed of sound. moreover, no aircraft ��� prop or jet ��� would have pulled out of such a steep dive at that speed. 
finally, yet importantly, all aircraft, civilian and military, cia or fbi, drone or whatever, flying high in united states commercial airspace are required by law to conform to faa lighting standards. this is to prevent mid-air collisions with other planes. my observed object was sitting in a main landing flight path over northeast dallas, which would have been filled with vulnerable commercial love field traffic an hour earlier. it was shining and blinking bright garish lights that were arranged in the bizarre pattern illustrated in the attachment, which made no sense and conformed to no codes or regulations. 
i have taken one-hour walks almost every night since we moved here in 1977 ��� 37 years ago ��� and have had an evening walking habit over a lifetime of 74 years. nights were convenient when i worked and i have logged many hours of dark sky viewing. except for a brief six-second glimpse of a silent dart-shaped silhouette four miles westward over the park cities at 8:00 pm on december 11, 2013, this was the only time that i have ever seen anything in the sky that i could not explain. the earlier december shadow traveled an estimated two miles, putting its speed at about 1,200-mph, before i lost it in the half moon���s glare. i did not think much about this first sighting because it was so distant and impersonal. conceivably, these two observations, only six-months apart, may have been of the same craft. 
two days after my june 13 observation, i wrote a short letter to the dallas morning news in hopes that other witness, perhaps near lochwood, had seen where the object went and what it did after plunging below the tree line. my letter was not published, which suggests that when these things are reported to the mainstream news media, they are laughed off. circuitously, since no one hears about them, there is nothing to them.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A lighted craft hovered 1 mile above me as i was walking alone at 11 pm.

content.detailedDescription:
We were hitchhiking on a road from blue rive going to council idaho for a rainbow gathering,  we were sitting on the side of the road,  when we saw this light above us hovering directory above us was glowing round object making above whirling sound and then made a triangle direction,  then hovered and went straight up into the sky and disappeared. i had another experience in aventura in n.M.B. florida about 1973 when i was sitting by the canal when i s aw a cigar dhabi craft hovering above the area that is filled with trees and then a light appeared then all of a sudden it disappeared up into the suddenly and was gone.Thats all. 
i have all so seen photos of all l so lines at area 51 that were taken in secret an sent to a friend in miami beach,  florida were servant statements included about a crashed space craft was captured as well as deceased aliens were taken to area 51.
content.summary: It hovered then made a triangle an took off straight up was reported by state troopers on florida's turnpike .
content.locationName: On the way to a rainbow g, Oregon

content.detailedDescription: At some time around midnight or maybe a bit later myself and a coworker were outside at the smoking area on a break smoking. you see i work midshift in communications at vandenberg air force base. often times when i go out to smoke i like to look at the stars if it is a clear night, so i feel like i have a pretty good grasp on what stars i usually see at various times at night and where they are positioned. anyhow on this particular night i notice what appeared to be a star but it was out of place meaning i don't recall seeing a star in the position it was in. so i watched it a bit closer and noticed it was changing colors. i could faintly see it go from white to green and then red and blue and orange and back to white. i really didn't keep track of any particular order however. so i said to my coworker "check that out, that seems a bit out of place doesn't it" and he said "it looks like a star and i said no its changing colors look closely and i don't recall any stars there at that elevation". so then i thought maybe it is just a plane (that would explain the lights) but it didn't move for 5 or maybe 8 minutes. so i said that cant be a plane it isn't moving. now the position of it, the best way i can describe is it was directly in line with the peak of a tree that is on the other side of the radomes in between the two of them sw in direction but above the tree and a fair bit above the tree. so i turned to talk to my coworker (not looking in the direction of the object) for about 20 or 25 seconds (or maybe less than that) and when i turned back the object was now suddenly below the peak of the tree in between that tree and another tree. i don't mean directly in between them, it was a long ways off but the view of it was now in between the trees. so i said to my coworker hey look at that it seems to have moved and fast. so him and i both watched the object now not taking are eyes off it. all of the sudden it looked like it was going out further (getting farther from us if you will but not going left or right just away) and pretty fast. then lights went white and then all of the sudden no light just black night sky as if it just disappeared. then within a second or 2 of it going black the light came back on real bright white then turned off again a few seconds later and it seemed to be moving back towards us. it then did the same thing as i just said, went further out light to no light then back on again. after this sequence it was gone i dint see it again.
content.summary: A sphere of blinking colored lights that moved fast and in difrent directions.

content.detailedDescription:
At night i am going for sleep @ night outside of our home. i am lay down on bed suddenly a  i saw a star coming down from sky. my mother say this is a star. my mother say if u pray when this moment you will got that pray.
it is always seen in sky when i am going for sleep. my mother also say that before too many years ago i am in our fields near our home then suddenly i saw a too big star with roaring she say that i think it is a airplane but its shape growing.
then i came at home.
content.summary: It is always seen in sky when i am going for sleep.

content.detailedDescription:
It was midday. the sun was out on a very clear day and the atmosphere was fresh and pleasant. my wife was present with me in the carport, while i was dusting off the car. it happened that i looked toward the back opening of the carport and my eye caught a very tiny but very bright light flickering off and on midair and halfway up from the floor to the top of the carport. i became transfixed to it, trying to understand what was happening. i told my wife to look and she saw it as well. the experience continued and i resolved to find out what this was. together we approached the area, and to my great astonishment i discovered it was nothing more than the narrowest almost invisible thread of a tiny spider hanging loose at the lower end, while the wind gently swayed the thread causing it to cast that brilliant reflection of sunlight.

i say all this, because it was the cause that made me look up in the sky in some form of relief from my intense curiosity. but, lo and behold another surprise was awaiting. just as i looked up toward the southeast about sixty-five degrees above the horizon, it is then that for a very brief moment i saw a rectangular three-dimension object motionless hovering in the sky, while on its left end (relative to my position)it projected four equal bands of what seems to have been exhaust or smoke; and all bands ending in a a curl-like form not far from the object. the strange thing about it was that the bands were well-formed without any dispersion, as though they were a fixed part of the object. in addition, there was no vapor trail beyond the curled endings of the bands. the object, in what i saw, had a smooth light greyish exterior surface and could be compared in overall shape to a cable tv box with no protrusions. i could not judge the distance, although i believe it was about five thousand feet up. yet, it could have been closer, because the clarity was so strong. in fact, the environment around the object appeared to me to be very clear and real, as though an enhancement to the sky. i was alone to experience this, and i only related it to my wife.

i like to add that i experienced no psychological reaction after the event. yet, my thought has often been: is it the mysterious, so to speak, spider luminous reflection that preceded rather than followed the event, that prepared me or set me up to experience the sighting?
content.summary: A very brief observation during a cursory look to the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1966 atlanta, ga 
very large silver/gray disc-like object hovered over entire shopping center across the street from la vista villas apts. located in a densely populated area in atlanta, ga.  many people saw it and dad reported it to the usaf shortly thereafter.  there were blue lights which were part of the object (embedded in the outer circumference of the object), and the lights were square and all connected and moved around the outer circumference in a continuous pattern.  the object was huge and it covered almost the entire shopping center across the street which shopping center at that time was comprised of a grocery store and several other stores within a small mall area all connected in one large lengthy structure. the ufo hovered for a long time - several minutes - directly over the shopping center - very close to the roof of the entire structure - and then lifted up slightly and took off at a slight angle almost straight up with vast speed and it was gone.  parents had just arrived home early evening from dinner in their car and had parked in parking lot for la vista villas apts. (high rise apartment buildings)directly across the street from this shopping center.  this occurred in a very densely populated area and many people saws it. mom hurried out of the car and ran to our apartment building and dad was walking briskly behind her trying to get his camera ready to take a photo but could not get a photo before the object abruptly left. dad died a few years ago but mom is 78 and remembers it well.

the area should basically still be the same.
total number of witnesses for this report is 2 - my mom and dad - but probably 100's of people saw it and when dad called to report it to the usaf he asked if other people had reported it, and the person he spoke with told him yes many people had called.
content.summary: Very large ufo with exterior lights moving around circumference

content.detailedDescription:
Background: i had laser surgery on my eyes earlier that week. my eyes went
from 20/100 to 20/10.

i was at home, wanted to go out and look at the stars.

i looked straight up and the three triangular objects were hovering above me. 

the first thing i thought was that it was three spaceships (either ours or
theirs), three mother ships.

again they hovered the whole time i was outside. it was not a trick to my eyes because nothing else on the ground or in the air looked like these things.

just thoght something was strange.

after i went back inside my home i came out 15 munutes later and they were gone.
content.summary: Three triangular objects hovered overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
Rendlesham afb, 1980.

i was station at camp new amsterdam in 1980 and was working zula alert for the air force and the ground mechanic on f-15 c, fighter jets.

that night approximately 8:30 pm i believe, both of our jets scrambled for rendlesham area, and flew over for about an hour and a half were killed their bingo fuel, and had to rtb, return to base. 

the pilots flying was capt. greeno, and lieut turner.  we recover the aircraft, and as mechanic's job is to download the video set a uhf cassette and put in a new one for the next flight. 

the pilots came back that night and instantly started talking about the scramble with us.  both them indicated they thought they were chasing them up unauthorized helicopter trying to find it on the radar, because of the low level and low-speed. 

however, they did mention that two objects left ground level and proceeded at 35,000 feet within seconds.  they told us the actually told the tower, without somebody shot missiles up in the air they were tracking.  however the objects stopped at 35,000 hovering briefly and then took off at 70,000 feet, or until the radar cannot track them anymore. 

the video(s) were downloaded by a crew chief friend of mine, on the recorder, which is standard protocol.  i observed two objects that appeared to be black in color, it was difficult due to the quality of the video, and the speed the fighter jets were moving towards the objects approximately 650 kn, 

the video also records radar tracking, and the objects shows approximations according to all aircraft loaded in the memory system so the fire just can have a match or friend or foe, the computer designated no match for the items.  there was also no mode 4 or squawk, friend or foe that typical aircraft send out under faa regulations of that time. 

the pilots reported the objects came back, a proximally 35 miles down range, and simply could not catch up with them even though they were stopping for skipping moving from 45,000 feet to 2000 feet.  

the one pilot, the capt.,  was a texan a good old boy,  and he indicated that he was not a believer in ufos he was that night.  there was no man in black, however there was some closed door meetings  days later, but they never asked the ground crew me us, about videos or the radar. 
what i saw on the video recorded from the f-15 hud, heads-up display by mcdonnell douglas, wasn't night but did indicate an object with no wings, triangular shape, and no faa regulation lighting but did have one maybe two lights, not sure where, the object was about 1 mile distance in front of the f-15. 

we did notice, when the pilot(s) returned they had indicated their radar when off-line briefly as well as their ins, for both aircraft this extremely improbable if not impossible.  

the f-15 aircraft were turned around and put back on 15 min. alert status.  the next night i was not there but they did scramble again back to england.  i notice none of the reports from this airbase indicated col. halt, that any aircraft jets were scrambled. 

and i'm indicating they were, because i was there.  it was camp in amsterdam cna, the netherlands.  or camp soesterburg holland netherlands. 
 
thank you
douglas rothman 
retired air force
480-306-0403
content.summary: 1980 usaf,

content.detailedDescription: it was a v shape with lights under neath three lights on each wing lights were big and round. we notice it after coming uder briges down town on the 5 fwy going southwhen it appeard coming between the twin towersflwing sideways then over the5fwy in front of us then over the police air station turned west out towards santa monica but going up and down gust over the root tops about150 ft up no sound no trails .
content.summary: Flew between twin towers over 5fwythen turned over police air station going west then twoards santa monica kiind zig zaging up and down  i was so uth bound on the 5fwy grandson saw it to .
